marklogic.body: I bought $20 in Curel for 5,000 point and never got my points, kmart was selling the wrong size lotion (25%more) in 20oz Spot and the (25% more) doesn't qualify for the bonus points... so I never got my 5,000. all they said was sorry, we'll look into that. & for the ziplock $5 coupon it never printed for me either, I spent $25 in grocery/beauty so my $1/2 ziplock coupons would double and I spent $15 in ziplock product in the same transaction. no one told me i couldn't do it all at once?
